text: Marian Pleașcă (born 6 February 1990) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a right back for Liga I side UTA Arad.Primul transfer al lui Edi Iordănescu la Gaz Metan Mediaș: un jucător “expulzat” de FCSB!. fanatik.ro ==Honours== ===Club=== Pandurii Târgu Jiu *Liga I: Runner-up 2013 ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |-
